name: flying-memory
effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Flying form.  Changes Multi-Attack's type to Flying.
short_effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Flying form.  Changes Multi-Attack's type to Flying.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A memory disc that contains Flying-type data.
It changes the type of the holder if held by
a certain species of Pokémon.
